author: Staff Reporter
text:
Flying squad personnel seized unaccounted cash of Rs. 74.50 lakh after intercepting a van at Iluppaiyoorani bus stop near Kovilpatti on Friday evening.

According to Kovilpatti Revenue Divisional Officer and Returning Officer of the constituency S. Kannabiran, the unaccounted cash was seized from one Vinoth, who works for a private company at Marthandam in Kanyakumari district. He said that he was on the way to deposit the cash in a bank. He was in possession of Rs. 2.40 crore and after verifying documents the squad seized Rs. 74.50 lakh. It would be handed over to him once he produced supporting documents for the seized money, he said.
title: Unaccounted cash of Rs. 74.50 lakh seized
